title: Design System
summary: Composable UI kit with theming and WCAG compliance.
description: A comprehensive design system built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring customizable theming, full WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, and a composable component architecture. The system includes over 50 reusable components, dark mode support, and comprehensive documentation.
features: Customizable theme system with dark mode

title: Analytics Dashboard
summary: High-performance dashboard with lazy loading and virtualization.
description: A high-performance analytics dashboard built with TypeScript and React, featuring real-time data visualization, lazy loading, and virtualization for handling large datasets. The dashboard includes interactive charts, customizable widgets, and export functionality.

title: E-commerce UI
summary: Delightful shopping experience with motion and accessibility.
description: A modern e-commerce platform built with Next.js and Stripe integration, featuring smooth animations, accessible design, and optimized performance. The platform includes product search, filtering, cart management, and secure checkout flow.
